item.title: About
item.description: Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But itâ€™s worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains. — Steve Jobs Welcome to my technical blog! I’m a Senior Software Engineer at Amazon AWS, where I work on the Lake Formation team. With a background in Cloud Storage, Data Analytics, Distributed Systems, Security, and Database Internals.
